name: Zeva!
greetingText: This was made by your biggest fan, Allanur
wishText: May all of your wishes came true and you will get into your dream university. I am rooting for you!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yayy! Wish you all the best...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
